message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not willing to pay $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10500. I'm willing to compromise further and offer it to you for $11200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not willing to pay $11200. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $10800. I think this is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
